name: FLAK
description:
Inspired by WW2 aerial combat training videos. Play as the axis and bomb the ally bunkers to victory!

With game mechanics loosely based on an old school arcade game Depthcharge. Attempt to get the highest score for each level by tactically choosing the right planes for the job while avoiding enemy flak fire!

This game was developed as a "weekend project", so keep an eye out for more free to play games on Steam as a way of promoting my commercial project Survivor Jones which is available to purchase on Steam now!

Leave a comment and follow me on my Survivor Jones YouTube channel, every like helps :)
